modName: ProlixUK's Misc N Materials code book
summary:
This mod adds a book with codes for all misc and material items in Skyrim.
This book can be obtained by entering into the console
"player.additem 31000D62 1" and hitting enter then it should be added into your inventory.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a book with codes for all misc and material items in Skyrim.
This book can be obtained by entering into the console
"player.additem 31000D62 1" and hitting enter then it should be added into your inventory.

you can manually install this mod by extracting the file to your Skyrim data file witch can be located at
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data

This is my second mod and the second out of 5 book mods im going to be doing.
feel free to comment any wishes you would like to see or just be a hater.
author: ProlixUK

files.name: ProlixUK's misc N meterials code book
